description: The intersection of different times creates a playful and humorous encounter.
title: A Tense Encounter
n_1: Time, an embodiment of the past, steps into the bar, catching the eye of Moment.
n_2: They stand facing each other, a clash of eras in their eyes.
n_3: A playful argument ensues, with Time showcasing his hourglass and Moment her modern watch.
n_4: Their laughter fills the bar, a harmony of past and present.
c1_1: Ah, the present, always so fleeting.
c2_1: And you, always dwelling in what's gone.
c1_2: Do you not cherish the memories?
c2_2: I live in the now, where everything happens.
c1_3: See, how quickly the sands fall.
